어휴

Player base can be pretty horrible at times and is personally one of the worst I have come across. The game itself is a bugged out mess but at least it's not as bad as it is on consoles am I right gamers? Balancing in the game is questionable at best and downright misguided at worst. Matchmaking is awful, as the MMR system itself is broken, often matching highly experienced survivors/ killers with players that have just installed the game; the search for a game is often excruciatingly long unless you are at high ranks where most of the player base is. 
Don't worry though, you'll be back at the main menu soon enough as you probably get tunnelled  and eliminated from the game early on as your teammates remain highly immersed in a patch of tall grass. A few changes have been suggested by the community to help deter killers from focusing on a single survivor to reduce team size early on, yet most of the time you just have to trust that your killer is going to play nice and not chase you straight off hook, which is about as successful as you would expect.
Playing a killer isn't much better either, the queue time is notably longer and the capacity for toxicity from the survivors in the lobby is usually very high, especially when they eclipse you in skill. There are numerous balancing issues with very meta perks on both sides which leads to most games playing out similarly with little variety. 

It's a true shame since the chases in game can be really fun, outsmarting each other to try and make distance on either side, that is however where most of the fun ends because between chases you get to either hold M1 on a generator for 80 seconds or watch them pop in the distance as you get your first hook of the game.
tons of iconic killers and chris redfield as a survivor. wholesome post game chats and good community. ggs.

Every game is thrilling and unique. You almost never know how the game will be played or what the outcome will be. There are many maps, each having a couple different variations to keep you guessing. I am constantly learning new things about this game every time I play. It is also fun to play with friends as survivors, or run custom games as killer and hunt them too.

Game is great overall sometimes ping issues but not too often and if you have a very low end pc it can be tough sometimes and this game is quite a grind.When playing with friends it can be really fun, but when playing try not to be too competitive because if you do you get mad,or tilted easily when having a rough time. But besides all of that it's fun with friends or playing solo with your favorite survivor or killer I recommend it.
